entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:57 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Millertown 03:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
